original_text: I have not dwelt in a house from the day I brought the Israelites up out of Egypt to this day. I have been moving from place to place with a tent as my dwelling.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘 자손을 애굽에서 인도하여 내던 날부터 오늘까지 집에 살지 아니하고 장막과 성막 안에서 다녔나니

sentences.original_text: I have not dwelt in a house
from the day I brought the Israelites up out of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이스라엘 사람들을 이집트에서 이끌어낸 그 날부터

sentences.original_text: I have been moving from place to place
with a tent as my dwelling
